title: Benchmarking Hierarchical Image Pyramid Transformer for the classification of colon biopsies and polyps in histopathology images
details: NSL Contreras, M D'Amato, F Ciompi, C Grisi… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Training neural networks with high-quality pixel-level annotation in histopathology whole-slide images (WSI) is an expensive process due to gigapixel resolution of WSIs. However, recent advances in self-supervised learning have shown that highly …
